installScript.script:
wget https://piston-data.mojang.com/v1/objects/0c3ec587af28e5a785c0c11af353b3b1cb095832/server.jar -O minecraft_server.1.21.jar && echo "eula=true" > eula.txt && if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then echo "server-port=25565
query.port=25565
gamemode=survival
difficulty=easy
max-players=20
level-name=world
view-distance=10
spawn-protection=0
online-mode=true
motd=A Minecraft Server
" > server.properties; fi
